mutants.code:
import math

def find_lcm(num1, num2, num3):
    gcd = math.gcd(num1, num2)
    lcm_num1_num2 = num1 * num2 / gcd
    gcd = math.gcd(lcm_num1_num2, num3)
    lcm = lcm_num1_num2 * num3 // gcd
    return lcm

import math

def find_lcm(num1, num2, num3):
    gcd = math.gcd(num1, num2)

    gcd = math.gcd(lcm_num1_num2, num3)
    lcm = lcm_num1_num2 * num3 // gcd
    return lcm

import math

def find_lcm(num1, num2, num3):
    gcd = math.gcd(num1, num2)
    lcm_num1_num2 = num1 / num2 // gcd
    gcd = math.gcd(lcm_num1_num2, num3)
    lcm = lcm_num1_num2 * num3 // gcd
    return lcm

import math

def find_lcm(num1, num2, num3):
    gcd = math.gcd(num1, num2)
    lcm_num1_num2 = (num1 + num2) // gcd
    gcd = math.gcd(lcm_num1_num2, num3)
    lcm = lcm_num1_num2 * num3 // gcd
    return lcm

import math

def find_lcm(num1, num2, num3):
    gcd = math.gcd(num1, num2)
    lcm_num1_num2 = num1 ** num2 // gcd
    gcd = math.gcd(lcm_num1_num2, num3)
    lcm = lcm_num1_num2 * num3 // gcd
    return lcm

import math

def find_lcm(num1, num2, num3):
    gcd = math.gcd(num1, num2)
    lcm_num1_num2 = num1 * num2 // gcd
    gcd = math.gcd(lcm_num1_num2, num3)
    lcm = lcm_num1_num2 / num3 // gcd
    return lcm

import math

def find_lcm(num1, num2, num3):
    gcd = math.gcd(num1, num2)
    lcm_num1_num2 = num1 * num2 // gcd
    gcd = math.gcd(lcm_num1_num2, num3)
    lcm = (lcm_num1_num2 + num3) // gcd
    return lcm

import math

def find_lcm(num1, num2, num3):
    gcd = math.gcd(num1, num2)
    lcm_num1_num2 = num1 * num2 // gcd
    gcd = math.gcd(lcm_num1_num2, num3)
    lcm = lcm_num1_num2 ** num3 // gcd
    return lcm
